casebody.data:
LAKE STEAM SHIPPING Co. v. BACON. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 24, 1906.) No. 261. Appeal from- the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. J. P. Kirlin, for libellant. C. S. Haight, for respondent.

Before WALLACE, TOWNSEND, and COXE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed with interest but without costs, as we agree with the opinion of the Commissioner, and with the opinion of the Court'below (137 Fed. 961).
